content.detailedDescription:
on sat august 20, 2005 at 11:45 pm i was outside working in my back garage workshop. i heard a loud whining noise that sounded directly overhead over the top of the garage where i was working.I walked outside holding a 3 million candlepower lamp light. when i walked outside and looked up at the right side of my garage directly overhead approximately 10 feet or so i saw a triangular shaped craft. i was so dumbfounded i didn't turn on my flashlight to take a look at it...And it was so close to me if i had my pole from the barn i could have reached it. the craft was approximately 12 feet by 12 feet by 12 feet for all three sides. it had three red lights-one in each corner of the triangle and a white light in the center approximately 12 inches in diameter. the white light wsa not very bright. more of a clearance light. (witness words as he has had flight time in small aircraft experience and a military background).

  i could not make out the sides, color or top of the craft in terms of shape and size. i do remember the craft which was stationery over my head rotated and maneuvered across my neighbors property flying over the top of their tool shed. the craft was able to maneuver over short trees in the back yard and around bigger trees. the craft maneuvered from the back yard to my neighbors back door. it came within three to four feet of the ground at times. when it got to my neighbors back door the craft maneuvered to the top of the roof of their house, went over the top of the roof out toward the street and out of sight. the sighting lasted about 15 minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A triangular shaped craft sighting at very close distance exhibiting flight maneuvers..

content.detailedDescription:
Away from home, awoke from sleep and began to stare at a clear bright northern night sky looking over the gulf of mexico from the window of a beach house on stilts-a tiny star like object possibly satellite or plane appeared to be making an orbit-it stopped and began to go back and forth-up and down-no pattern-awoke person sleeping with me-as we watched it drop in the sky it changed to a huge saucer like object directly in front of the window-couldnt determined size-300 ft might be close-football field in length-hard to tell-we both were able to describe what we saw to reinforce our sighting-pleading to let us board-four windows on the underside facing us-2/3 of bottom a round bright light that appeared to be the power source-it moved slowly up in the sky-we ran outside and got under the object pleading to let us board-it made another ascension into the sky and from stand-still it zoomed with no sound  to the southeast and eventually out of sight. we were very excited and telling the experience always comes with a letdown due to disbelief.

we have no missing time but alot of facts came to mind that i had never considered-strange things about how we evolved and how we connect to them-they were from orion-pelates-siris connected-i do not have recall what they might have looked like-why would we think these things without boarding-we never talked about missing time because it didnt seem to matter

the strangest thing about this for us is the fact that they knew i was watching the sky-made the fact know from a distance and come close for observation.  the person that had this encounter with me is dead but it was a habit to call each other just to go over the facts again and consider how fortunate we were for the experience.
content.summary: Silver grey green-windows on underside-circular bottom brightly lit.

content.detailedDescription: It was during the 4th of july when the odd vehicle apparently docked with a larger vehicle. soon i found a pair of bionoculers to observe the bullet-like struture scramjet.After 4 minuets it headed west at unimagenible speeds and faded away.Soon after two jets were headingthe exact same direction.
content.summary: Green tentecled

content.detailedDescription: I was at a church camp in central oregon lying in a feild under the stars one night at about 11 p.M. a bunch of us were outside that night but most had already gone to sleep. as i lie there on my back way out over the tree tops i saw what at the moment seemed to be a super bright star. as i looked at it, it jumped probably 100 miles almost instantly then jumped in a different direction. i felt bad waking anyone up so i let the people sleep. before long i heard some people a few rows down talking about this thing that would jump in seemingly random directions every five seconds or so. so i walked to them and watched it with them. we concluded it was very far away probably 100 to 150 miles away and was moving far to fastto be a helicopter which is what they thought it was at first sight. after probably half a hour it just dissapeared instantly gone like it had never been there.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple people saw what at first appeared to be a star suddenly move and stop at super speeds

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed an orange light in the distance as i was watching fire works.

the object was heading in my direction. the path was ambling in a "s" path with an upward pattern matching the ground contour.

object was about 40-45 feet above ground.

object was rectangular shape. the light was rectangular, evenly orange in color and "glowed" without hot spots. size est 3 ft tall by 2 ft wide.

the object came from the east as it went over my neighbors house, making a sweeping 90 degree turn over our road and continued to move turning south away from me. as it turned away from me the frame of the light was sharp and the light looked to be contained in a "lantern" shaped box. as the light turned the light reduced in width down to nothing or black. the object moved over my rear neighbors home and disappeared.

no loss of time. no other known effects observed. no sounds except fireworks arround the area. 

i was interviewed by mufon field investigator on 7-12-08.
content.summary: Luminescent orange rectangular lantern

content.detailedDescription:
I just sent in a report yesterday regarding these flashes in the sky i, and sometimes witnesses, have been seeing in the night sky (and once in a bright sunset sky).  it happened again last night and now i feel simply frustrated wondering what it is.  

again, i emphasize: i know aircraft flight patterns and behaviors locally.  i grew up in the approach path to seatac airport, my husband flies fixed wing and helicopter, i also grew up in a family where my father was a teacher and one of our regular summer activities was sleeping under the stars and watching satellites.  dad would write the satellite sightings down on a pad and call some number in seattle the next morning and then report to us what satellites they were and what country they originated in.  we even saw a blinking satellite on several occasions and learned about satellites with mylar on them rolling and "appearing" to be blinking as they rolled in orbit.

these "flashes" i have been seeing are different in that:

the flashes are brighter and whiter than strobes or aircraft lights (except in the case an aircraft is banking or turning in the sky and you get a strong flash when it is directly at you...But you see the aircraft and its trajectory).

the flashes are erratic when multiple are viewed.  you'll see i.E., one bright flash...3 to 5 seconds of nothing...Then another flash...1/5 second, another...Then nothing no matter how long you fix your eyes on the spot scanning peripherally for any flight movement.

the flashes have a slow "blink" time.  like someone opening for instance, a lens a shutter and closing it. 

i saw the multiple flashes sunday night 7/13 under the handle of the big dipper around 10:30pm or so...I didn't look at the exact time.  it was same spot i and my daughter viewed the flashes in early may.

last night, 7/14, i saw a bright flash straight over head and the nw slightly.  just one bright white flash and although i stared at the spot to pick up any aircraft and as with the others, there was simply nothing after the flashes.  just dark sky.

i need to point out that i hate sensationalizing and stories that obviously are embellished for excitement.  i need to also point out i have seen many flashes over my lifetime and when they are an aircraft, you eventually see their flight pattern take up at some point and see navigation lights.  these are just so different.  brighter, longer flash time, and no movement accompanying the flashes.  i was pretty excited last night to see the flashes two nights in a row.  i'm telling you begin to think it's "personal".  i'm really trying not to go there, but it was like it was flashing at me.  i feel stupid for even suggesting that but i figure you hear it all.

i'm not quick to jump to conclusions regarding ufos probably because of growing up with aircraft and satellites.  i'm even wondering if there is some metal debris out in space that floats around our atmosphere and periodically rolls so it reflects the sun back really bright.  i just don't know if you'd simply see one to three sporadic flashes and then nothing.
content.summary: Bright flash

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving on hwy 42 from boulder co to lafayette co at 1:45pm. my son looked up because he heard a jet flying overhead. we were in a convertable. when he saw the jet , he noticed there was a white disc flying due north from the jet(military). he said to me, dad i didn't know the military had planes with no wings or tails. i said they don't. he then told me what he saw and i looked up and saw the same thing he was describing. we drove to a friends house,took around ten minutes. i got my friends camera and waited outside with a group of 5 other people. we were looking in the sky in a south eastern direction and then not one but two discs appeared and started to zip around the sky. they made no noise and flew at speeds that  no plane of any kind i have ever seen. the jet seemed to be trying to follow them for a period of 15 mins. then the discs were gone. i took pictures and have submitted two of them.  only wish i had had a telephoto lens. the exact time the photos were taken was 2:13pm july 13, 2008.
content.summary: Watched 2 discs zip around for 30 mins

content.detailedDescription:
When i first saw the objects, they were in two pieces. they appeared as two really large stars, then kind of melded together and i called my daughter and her boyfriend outside. they watched it and at first thought it was just a really large star, but then it appeared to have some kind of tail like a comet. there was a kind of tail of fire behind it.

it remained in the same place the entire time i was outside (until approx 11 pm) and never changed location. it just rotates and kind of changes shape.
content.summary: A large star-like object in the se arkansas skies appeared around 9pm. was first in two pieces then moved to one.

content.detailedDescription: I had just made a right hand turn onto marilyn parkway from kitty hawk in mesquite, nevada. i looked to the north and there was a disc like domed object hovering about one-half mile east of the mesquite airport. the craft was approximately five hundred feet above the ground. according to a map it was approximately 2460 feet from my position. i pulled my car over to the side of the road and watched the object for about two minutes. it did not move and it made no noise. it was sidewalk gray and reminded me of a pith helmet. after about two minutes in the hovering mode it departed in the northerly direction and within one to two minutes it had disappeared completely. it was the most incredible thing that i have ever seen. from my position it was about one inch wide and a half inch thick. see drawing and maps attached.
content.summary: It was sidewalk gray and made no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in my apartment building reading when i went outside for a cigarette. i have a pretty good view of the night sky from the front door. i was sitting on the curb smoking and watching the sky (i am aware of the increased ufo activity in my area). i saw what at a glance would seem to be a bright star, or possibly venus. but the light kept flickering, and then it moved. it did not dart around the sky; but you could observe it sort of rocking back and forth slightly. i crouched down behind a railing, since the wood of the railing blocked out the nearby street lights, giving me a slightly better look. the harder i focused on it, then looked away, then looked closely again, i could easily swear it was not a star, plane, helicopter, meteor, or anything else i can think of. it was far enough away that shape is very hard to say; but it did seem to have a vague cigar-shape, and the flickering i first noticed was easily (on really looking at it and focusing) identified as flickering lights. as for color, the best i could make out was yellow and red. the object moved very slowly; i watched it for about ten minutes, still not really moving other than the slight zigging back and forth, then went inside for a few minutes to call a friend. watching it continuously it did not appear to change its position in the sky, but after being gone and coming back, it had clearly moved further across the sky. after another fifteen or so minutes watching, it vanished very slowly. it didn't streak off into space; just very, very slowly faded into the distance. i kept my eyes on it as long as possible, then lost it; it became too faint, or moved too far away. or both. the part that should interest you is not only have i just had this experience now, right before i wrote this, but this was actually the third time. july 12th, 1am, same experience. ditto for july 14th. same time, same duration, same everything. so it seems logical to assume it will be back tomorrow night or the night after. i would be more than happy to send you more information as i observe it, but i also know you have people in the area. i would give anything for binoculars or a telescope to get a better look at this thing if it returns again, since it has now faithfully appeared three times in four nights (might have been four-for-four; i wasn't around the 13th) at the same time and in the same area of sky. but it is way up there, and i wish it would come closer. i'm sure you do, too. thanks for listening.
content.summary: A blinking moving light far up in the night sky that returns

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside to smoke and checked out the sky as usual and noticed a fast moving light highup, i continued to watch it, so mystified i had to go to my backyard to continue but it disappeared behind a large dark cloud judy as soon as i arrived. it moved so fast it was unthinkable the speed it could be going in a straight line going north, north west.  i wanted to try and get it on cellphone i was holding but i took my eyes off for 1 sec to figure it out and nearly lost sight of it so decided agaisnt the good idea.
content.shape: Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Cone,  Chevron,  Cross,  Diamond,  Disc,  Fireball,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Teardrop,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Like a speeding jet with yellowish lights.

content.detailedDescription: It started 4-5 weeks ago,my mother and i on the front stoop having a smoke shortly after dark. we saw a low and slow orb headed n by ne.The object made no sound as it came across our view. we had it in our view for 30-45 seconds,turned upwards at a 45 degree angle,and shot off at a speed so fast if you were to blink it would have looked as though it disappeared. this was late june. the next night around the same time(8:30-9pm)wile walking the family dog and that image of the orb still in my mind,keeped looking sky ward and was on my way to check the mail. i saw a few bright stars, got the mail,and headed back to the house. thats when i noticed one of the brighter stars was out of place,and was moving w to e.Now,every night,mother,brother,brother's girlfriend,and myself sit out on the front stoop and watch the skys.Four weeks later,we watch as what look like stars move across the sky at high altitudes         move in ways i've never seen any aircraft do. no faa lights(as seen through binoculars).Denver is the mile high city with the largest airport in the nation. we are very accustom to seeing planes and their normal flight paths. i have seen satellites before,these objects appear and disappear,speed up,slow down,and change direction. we also think one of the objects might have tried to signal us as we were trying to signal them with a green laser keychane lite and a flash light. this took place last night(7/13/08)as we got excited with a total count of 24 objects. the event started at 15 after 9 pm and lasted until about midnight. no photos were taken as the objects appear to look like stars to the naked eye. although,through binoculars they appear to be glowing orbs that are zipping out in to space(i say zip as the only way to describe the way they move).I was wondering if this was a hot spot?Has anyone in this area seen something like this???
content.summary: Incredable speeds,stoping and then resuning,changeing directions,appearing/disappearing,flashing(not faa lights)up to ten witnesses over a four week period!

content.detailedDescription: It started 4-5 weeks ago,my mother and i on the front stoop having a smoke shortly after dark. we saw a low and slow orb headed n by ne.The object made no sound as it came across our view. we had it in our view for 30-45 seconds,turned upwards at a 45 degree angle,and shot off at a speed so fast if you were to blink it would have looked as though it disappeared. this was late june. the next night around the same time(8:30-9pm)wile walking the family dog and that image of the orb still in my mind,keeped looking sky ward and was on my way to check the mail. i saw a few bright stars, got the mail,and headed back to the house. thats when i noticed one of the brighter stars was out of place,and was moving w to e.Now,every night,mother,brother,brother's girlfriend,and myself sit out on the front stoop and watch the skys.Four weeks later,we watch as what look like stars move across the sky at high altitudes         move in ways i've never seen any aircraft do. no faa lights(as seen through binoculars).Denver is the mile high city with the largest airport in the nation. we are very accustom to seeing planes and their normal flight paths. i have seen satellites before,these objects appear and disappear,speed up,slow down,and change direction. we also think one of the objects might have tried to signal us as we were trying to signal them with a green laser keychane lite and a flash light. this took place last night(7/13/08)as we got excited with a total count of 24 objects. the event started at 15 after 9 pm and lasted until about midnight. no photos were taken as the objects appear to look like stars to the naked eye. although,through binoculars they appear to be glowing orbs that are zipping out in to space(i say zip as the only way to describe the way they move).I was wondering if this was a hot spot?Has anyone in this area seen something like this???
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Incredable speeds,stoping and then resuning,changeing directions,appearing/disappearing,flashing(not faa lights)up to ten witnesses over a four week period!

content.detailedDescription: Witness and friend noticed orange glow in woods.  thought it might be campfire so went to investigate.  in clearing in the woods was a large disc shaped object emitting orange glow.  totally silent.  boys ran home. later looked out their bedroom window and saw a 3ft diameter ring of light on the ground.  nothing above shining the light onto the ground, just a glowing ring of light.  then they saw 2 'things' run by the lights.  they were on 2 legs, about 3 ft tall, skinny, with big heads.
content.summary: Orange glow in woods, entities later

content.detailedDescription: They travel from the south east to the west from the east to the west.
content.summary: This air travel is every night, it is later now because of the change of time, if it's cloudy or to foggy you can't  get a picture.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the night of the grammy awards; that's how i know the exact date.
my room mate and i were un loading the car and she noticed the bright light in the sky. i at first thought it was just venus. but she pointed out it was in the wrong part of the sky. my next thought was it was a helicopter, with the large spotlight on. you couldn't hear any sound from it but i thought that was because it was too far away. a few minutes later a small airplane flew towards the light and circled underneath it, in large circling loops.
what really caught my attention was that you could hear the airplane clearly. there were cloud layers and the light & plane were below cloud level. i also new a pilot would not be circling under a helicopter..And i now new if i could hear the airplane, i for sure would have heard the chopper.
i went upstairs and called the airport at lax & told them i was watching a large light in the sky, with a small plane circling underneath. the man i was talking to said they were tracking it on radar and did not know what it was.
i got really excited and said something like, "wow, it is really an ufo?".
he answered something about no, it wasn't a ufo, they just didn't know what it was. i hurried back down stairs (we were watching this out in front of our apartment house) i guess we watched for about15 minutes..The light didn't move, the small plane continued circling under the light..(not up close to the object, but still under it) here comes the good part.. 
the object was in the north west part of the sky. i looked over towards the east and a military jet was flying towards the direction of the light. i remember we said , "this is going to be interesting." the jet was flying at the normal jet speed, as far as i could tell. it got about half way towards the light (half way from where we first saw it) the large light just turned off and a small light was there, like a small star would look in the night sky. as soon as it blinked off & became star sized, it just shot off, towards the pacific ocean. there was no sound at all.I've never seen anything move like that. way faster than a shooting star, way, way faster than that jet was moving.
once it was gone, i went back upstairs and called lax again.. this time whoever i talked to denied they were tracking anything. "i have no idea what you are talking about" was the basic message i got. 
i looked in the paper the next day but didn't see anything.
i have no idea why it would stay in the sky that way..I'm guessing we watched it for about 20 minutes in all.
we were living in the redondo  beach area, not close to the beach, maybe a 10 minute drive to the actual beach. i don't remember the exact time, but it seems to me it was just starting to get dark. probably after sunset.
is there anyway you guys can check lax's information , like in the freedom of information act? would they tell the truth about tracking it on radar? or has too much time gone by?
thanks, just wanted to share my story..I've told many friends about it but i've never shared it in written form.
content.summary: Very bright light, looked like venus, but wasn't

content.detailedDescription: It was snowing very continuously that night but the sky had that slight lit up look. my husband took our puppy out for a walk while i stayed home. he proceeded to go north up the street and follow the main road through town( our town is dark except for porch lights and corner street lights). he noticed when he stopped for the puppy that a series of five yellow silent objects moving across the northwestern part of town in silence.  he watched them move -then move so fast out of sight that he said it was in a second. what was unusual after that was about two minutes after the sighting there was an extremely loud roar following after them. he could see nothing but he proceeded home to me. upon arrival at home i greeted him with the fact that our windows and doors in our house had shook so bad for a minute that i would have thought it was a tornado sitting on our house!! i went outside and saw nothing. it was not thunder. it was not sonic boom. it seemed more like something unseen was following what he had just seen and i had only heard. the next day several people in our town were all talking about what had happened that night. i hope this did not only happen to our town. thank you.
content.summary: Five yellow equal objects in formation silent.

content.detailedDescription:
i was on my back balcony at our lake house taking a break from my freelance artwork. i was gazing at the night sky full of stars and had been looking at the sky for a few minutes. i turned towards the house, looking up over the roof, when my eyes locked on to the sphere. it was a very bright yellow-white color and had very clean, crisp edges. it made no sound and was streaking in a straight line. had i blinked, i don't think that i would have noticed it. i can only relate the experience to when your eyes catch a glimpse of a lightning bolt- my eyes were looking in the right place at the right time. only this sphere was moving at what seemed a slower speed than lightning but still at an incredible rate of speed. i couldn't see any trail or exhaust wake behind the sphere. it traveled a straight path, west to east, over my roof top and i lost sight of it when it passed over the trees on the other side of the horizon. our house is up high on a hill so i gestimate that the distance covered by the sphere in the two to three seconds viewed had to be 10 to 20 miles, more or less. there were no clouds in the sky at the time of the sighting. i think the sphere was thousands of feet above my head, but since i don't know the actual size of the object that altitude is questionable. 
  the sky was so clear that night and the clarity of the sphere was optimum. i was excited to see it because i knew that what i was seeing wasn't a commercial jet, civilian plane or meteor. i thought to myself, if it was military, then i congratulate the armed forces on building such a speedy and quiet craft that possibly doesn't pollute the environment like our stock aircraft do.
content.summary: Very bright yellow-white sphere, very crisp, clean edges, no sound- moving at incredible speed in straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
Third time we've seen these bright flashing blips.  in 1997 my husband and i observed 3 bright flashing blips in the west at sunset, so the sky was very bright, but the flashes were sporadic and in 3 separate places close together in the sky.  2nd time we noticed the flashes was in early may.  my daughter and i watched a single sporadic flashing light under the big dipper.  last night was the 3rd time - again under the big dipper.  it flashed a very bright light, white in color. a few second later it flashed twice.  my husband is a pilot.  we are very familiar with both fixed wing and helicopter "behaviors" and light patterns.  these "flashes" are never associated with seeing any further flight pattern in any direction.  when we have seen these flashes  we tend to stand staring into the sky for a long time afterward, waiting to see if any flight pattern emerges.  an individual can stare into the sky and catch any peripheral movement, such as a helicopter or fixed wing continuing on in some direction.  we are aware also of aircraft turning or changing direction appearing like flashes as they turn, however...These flashes we are reporting never have any such aircraft.  they are simply very, very bright white flashes in the sky followed by nothing, no matter how long you stare.  we have found it interesting that the flashes have always been approximately in same area of the western sky, although from different perspectives.  the first was from olympia wa (25 mi from our current home), the second two incidents were seen from our back deck in shelton, wa. we also have mcchord air force base and ft lewis within 50 miles from us.  we are very accustomed to seeing military aircraft as well.  i had one other ufo experience as an adult and two as a child.  the first experience is very awkward to talk about but perhaps someone else has experienced something similar so i will recount it:
in 1965 i slept in a dormer bedroom with windows facing west.  the head of my bed was against this western wall to the left side of the window (facing the window from inside). i woke to a sense of extreme panic.  at an angle through the dormer wall were two red lines of light the circumference of a pencil or one of those laser lights.  they entered the wall about at the 5' mark on the wall above my head and laid at an angle from there to the foot of my bed, as though i had two red lines of light the width of my bed.  i couldn't move anything but i could see the light-lines.  inside of myself, i knew there was something outside the house shining the lines of light through my wall and i instinctively knew it was the red lines that were making me paralyzed.  i was extremely terrified for a moment, but next thing i knew it was morning so i knew i had fallen back asleep.  i have had no residual effects from that experience.  when i was ten in 1966, i was on a road trip around the usa with my family.  we were going through the deserts of utah when we all observed two large cigar shaped objects with a 'string' of 7 smaller objects between them.  it was way in the distance and seemed very high. we watched them in the sky for approximately 45 minutes as we traveled.  the 3rd time was when i and my two children were at mount rainier camping in 1986.  after dark we walked to the large river that runs from the nisqually glacier to lay on a blanket and watch the stars for meteors.  we all watched as a blinking object moved in the eastern sky toward mt rainier at a rate of speed that would not be uncommon for an aircraft, but as it approached closer to the silhouette of the mt., it suddenly just shot off like a shooting star.  it shot off on the same trajectory line as it was flying and blinking which angled up into the sky.  when it shot off, it truly was fast as a falling star.  like a blur of light.  we all remember it clearly.  i have never thought of reporting any of these experiences, but i figure if you are compiling reports, perhaps what i myself, or us as a family have experienced may match what someone else has reported as well, so for the reason, i thought it would be good to share these events.  thank you for listening.  i feel a bit goofy knowing i am sharing with these with someone.
content.summary: Bright blips

content.detailedDescription:
I looked off my back deck and saw what looked like a cigar tube, "hanging" in the sky. it was vertical. the sun was glinting off of
it's metallic (like chrome" surface.

it caught my eye in that, it just hung there about 1 mile or so away to the west.
it was not moving at all. i've never seen anything in the sky like that.
i had a very clear view of it and i have better than 20/20 vision.

there were a lot of fast moving clouds, so i only saw it breifly.
i have no doubts that it wasn't anything man made. as the clouds kept rolling by it must have dissappeared.


also, on july 4th, i came home from work and my wife told me that she saw something. she said she saw a row of about 5 white lights moving west in the skies over our condo. as they passed, the lights turned red. she said they were slow moving and made no sound. the gradually got higher and higher moving west towards carver.
    i was at work at the time and got home at midnight. she told me about her encounter and that she felt creepy and couldn't sleep. she normally retires at 8:30-9pm.
content.summary: 2 sightings in plymouth mass.

content.detailedDescription:
Outside watching the skies. there have been alot of weird sightings in indiana in the last year it seems..

so me and another witness kept watching the skies, we kept telling ourselves that we were probably seeing jets and airplanes .. but it kept circling the area.. which was weird cause jets and planes don't change direction that fast, either it was doing that or there were more than 1 aircraft it was showing up on all sides of us.. within minutes going east then going west. then going north.. we recorded one instance of this thing defying physics of what ordinary aircraft are able to .  it like jumps straight down then straight up again 2 times, then increases in altitude ..
shortly afterward there were 2 other aircraft with just blue and red lights on it "not blinking" following the direction of these things we saw.. and  im pretty sure i got at least 1 of them on film also.. 

as soon as i get this video up i will make it available to you if you wish to see it.
content.summary: Red/white flashing lights  that move unlike any known aircraft followed by 2 what seemed to be jets?

content.detailedDescription:
I am lifelong resident of russia oh and am currently 52 years old.  i am a 28 year employee of the usps and postmaster for 18 years in russia oh.  i have been on village council for 12 years.  i am also a private pilot.
  one summer night when i was either 14 or 15 myself and 4 or 5 other boys were sleeping under the stars at a friends house in the country.  we were all laying on our backs looking at the stars during the early evening.  one of us spotted a light in the sky almost at the zenith that was moving.  at was about the brightness of a very bright star.  not as bright as venus but maybe as bright as deneb.  we all saw it and all watched it moved around an area of sky about the area of maybe 5 degrees square.  it would move fast then slow and make both acute and obtuse angles.  it went straight but made turns very abrupt.  there was no sound that it made.  it appeared to be very high in the sky.  there were no nav lights or beacons.  at times it appeared to move as fast as a satellite observed at dusk but not usually that fast.  my friend were we were staying went to get his small telescope to try to look at it but by the time he came back out we could not locate it again.

if you could give me a possible explanation of what we saw that night i would appreciate it.  i have wondered what we saw that night for about 40 years now and never forgot.  thank you..
content.summary: Bright light ~mag 0 moving errantically in sky for about 10 minutes-no noise-on blinking lights-solid white light

content.detailedDescription:
(this account is in the witness words as i am a mufon investigator who filed the short form report) 

     on sat august 20, 2005 at 11:45 pm i was outside working in my back garage workshop. i heard a loud whining noise that sounded directly over the top of the garage where i was working. i walked outside holding a 3 million candlepower lamp light. when i walked outside and looked up to the right side of my garage directly overhead approximately 10 feet or so i saw a triangular shaped craft. i was so dumbfounded i didn't turn my flashlight on to take a look at it and it was so close to me if i had my pole from the barn i could have reached it. the craft was approximately 12 feet by 12 feet by 12 feet for all three sides. it had 3 red lights-one in each corner of the triangle and a white light in the center approximately 12 inches in diameter. the white light was not very bright. more of a clearance light.(witness words as he has flight time in small aircraft experience and a military background.

    i could not make out the sides, color or top of the craft in terms of shape and size. i do remember the craft which was stationery over my head rotated and maneuvered across my neighbors property flying over the top of their tool shed. the craft was able to maneuver over short trees in the back yard and around bigger trees. the craft maneuvered from the back yard to my neighbors backdoor. it came within three to four feet of the ground at times. when it got to my next door neighbors back door the craft maneuvered to the top of the roof of their house, went over the top of the roof out toward the street and then went up the street and out of sight. the sighting lasted about 15 minutes.
content.summary: a triangular shaped craft  sighting at very close distance exhibiting flight maneuvers in tight spaces.

content.detailedDescription: i was looking out the bathroom window which faces to the north.The lights were off ,and, i was toweling off after showering.I was looking through the screen and did not have my glasses on,which are required for driving.With my glasses off, i can see fairly well,but, peoplke and objects are a bit fuzzy.....I had been looking at the trees and sky for short time and noticed a circle of beautiful white and blue lights moving from my left to my right.I was amazed at what i saw! it slowly(?) moved above the trees.I could not see it any longer,after say,5 minutes.There was no sounds or another object carrying this circle of lights.I felt a sense of calm and peace,plus,amazement at what i had seen! at first i thought it might be a blimp carrying the circle of lights.I caledd 311 in austin and got excited telling the operator what i had seen.She told me she had seen,evidently, the same object a few miles from where i live!We discussed the object, its movemment,time,etc. she gave me the number for the national ufo reporting hotline in washington.I called that number,left a message.
content.summary: A circular object mving slowly across north austin,with beautiful white and blue lights ,in dots and dashes.  no sounds or  transporting vehicle .

content.detailedDescription:
The craft was first spotted at arout 1:15pm from the three shells beach as me and a friend were sitting eating lunch. my friend pointed out that there was somthing flying over the estury. it appeared to be hovering over the refinery in kent. it appeared to have a slightly larger diameter than the tanks we could see across the estury. it firstly appeared to be a long cigar shaped object but as it moved out from infront of the clouds, we could see that it had a pearl shaped top. it was shadowed underneath and had light reflecting off of the top. it was moving very slowly so we decided that it could not be a plane. the object was about 2000 feet above the ground, judging by the cloud base which was 3000 feet. the object drifted westwards towards london and appeared to be getting closer rapidly before drifting further away, this pattern began just before the craft reached the other side of canvey and continued until we lost sight of it after it had passed canvey. just before we lost sight of the object, it appeared to be about half way between the clouds and the horizon. my friend claimed to see a flash just before it went out of sight but i did not see this flash as i had already lost sight of the object.

the included image is a drawing of what i saw
content.summary: Ufo spotted over kent slowly moving towards london

content.detailedDescription:
Actually, the first occurrence happened on the morning of the 13th @ approximently 2:45am.  for some unknown reason i didn't feel tired, so i went outside to see if i could spot the black widow spider that had been making webs from the rosemary bushes to the sidewalk in front of my house.  i saw no spider.  then i began to look at the stars.  as i was taking in their beauty, i noticed one star-like object traveling northward.  when i spotted the object it was straight above. i knew it was moving, because it passed the other stars. i assumed it to be a satellite.  it made no sound and stayed on the same trajectory.
     
on this monday morning, i got up to take a wiz, and then just thought, 'i wonder if i could spot that sattelite again'.  at approximately 3:00am,  much to my surprise, i spotted two star-like objects.  they passed the same stars that i had seen yesterday.  that's how i knew they were moving.  at first they flew parallel, about four fingers apart.  then they began to converge.  as they were converging, a very recognizable commercial jet flew underneath them.  the jet was heading east and made the usual noise.  the star-like objects flew silently and northward.  they then flew closer to each other, two fingers apart. then they disappeared into a cloud.  i watched on the other side of the cloud to see if they would reappear, but the distance must have been too great.  i could not see them anymore.  i came in and checked the time on the micro wave oven and made a note for me.  then i thought maybe i should share these experiences.
content.summary: Two tiny star-like objects spotted directly above my house and they flew westward.

content.detailedDescription: Just got back from the store went in the house me and my bro had bought 1 16oz beer a peace and rolling up some green i finished rolling up and we to the front porch so we sat down on the porch chairs facing the house across the street so we started talking we both just opened up the beers i took a sip my bro phone rings i look at him sitting to my right side i say whos that he says his dad so im still looking at him and he leans forward talking like lookink toward the ground so i leand back and started looking across the street i noticed a orange/amber light appear i said 2 my self shooting star than another just appeared diagnalto the bootm right of the light and i said another shooting star outloud my bro heard me and looked up then another light was cooming across the sky toward the first 2 but lower and i said  a chopper then we watched it get close to the second light and stoped then four more lights lite up with the first 3 like in v shape formations faceing us and they just stayed there and u could see like a orange amber color fuzzing around the lights with a grayish middle like that then on light went out the another and the other five went out like some one hit the light switch  so we are like what the [profanity deleted] was that then im like and i cant beleive that i just witnessed that so we tell mom to come out side im siting ther shaking hair on my arms standing up we start teling her what we had seen she noticed how shook up we were after the incident that we had to have seen what we said we seen she stayed on the porch with us for about 15minutes listening to us tell her what we seen then she went back in so me and bro still on the porch still like what the [profanity deleted] still looking in the same sot in the sky where we seen the lights tryin to calm down i sipped my beer again and proceeded to light green next thing we no its 5 army choppers coming from the left side of the sky  bigones had to have been blackbirds flying real fast and low to the point where you could see that the sidedoors were opened on them we wathched as they passed by  talking to bro i said some [profanity deleted] went down the the choppers kept going we couldnt see or hear them anymore  talking to [profanity deleted] some thing don happed and that was some alien [profanity deleted] so we started looing back in the direction the light were and started seenin planes and jets doing big boxs in the air  like they were looking for what we seen the planes were going around and around for like 20 minutes and the they went of to the left and couldnt see them anymore
content.summary: Shooting star then another appeared

content.detailedDescription:
My exact position is 38.4995���n, 89.9515���w. oddly enough, earlier tonight around 10pm, after watching a dvd documentary called "capturing the light" about one contactee case in canada (dorothy izatt, an 81-year old woman who captured over 30,000 feet of 8mm film of ufos/orbs/lightbeings over 30 years), me and my friend steve went outside for a cigarette. the moment we went out, we both noticed a strange bright light off on the horizon, just about due northwest, hovering off in the distance above the trees. we both initially thought that it was a plane or a star, but the object started to move back and forth, sort of wobbling a bit, before shining so brightly as to outshine the moon for a moment. i have seen plenty of airplanes in my life (i used to work at catholic health association in st. louis and they are right next to the airport so i've seen plenty of aircraft go directly overhead as well). the light wobbled back and forth for a good minute or two, my friend and i standing there transfixed by the object. several times, the light went completely out, to reappear nearby a second or two later. there was definitely a strange, other-worldly feeling while we watched it. it seemed to respond to us in a way, once we stated that it should "do something impressive" and a second or two later, it would light up. also, i noticed that when it lit up brightly, i got a strange electric sensation throughout my body, and my hairs stood on end, like when you touch the van de graaff generator at the fun house. i got excited and went inside to yell to my friend ali to "get outside now!", but i found that when i ran back out, the object went off to the right behind the trees, and dimmed, as if it didn't want my friend ali to see it. she went back inside after a few minutes, and i felt compelled to walk across the street and across a grass field to the edge of a corn field, in the direction of the ufo. i remember thinking to myself "where did you go?", and a moment later, it popped out again from behind the trees, lit up for a second, then dimmed and went back down behind the trees. it was still far away. i'd say the entire time it was a good 5-10 miles away, but it's hard to tell because it was so dark. the most incredible part of the experience was the fact that it seemed to respond to our thoughts and voices, and the light it emitted was of a quality i've never seen before. it was such a bright white as to appear almost blue-ish white. i've been hoping to see an actual ufo, as i have been researching ufos quite a bit lately, and looking at alot of amazing video evidence. but there's no words to describe the real thing. it's such a strange feeling, so compelling as to leave one with no choice but to believe.

something is about to happen, i feel. more and more people are seeing lights in the sky, and more video is being captured, and the frequency of sightings seems to be increasing. maybe we are about to finally make contact, and the government coverup will finally end. one can only hope.
content.summary: Bright lights in the sky to the northwest

content.detailedDescription: I am a truck driver and was pulling out of south bend indiana with a load.  i was watching light bugs in the trees and bushes on both sides of the highway.  it was dark, but the half moon was out and bright in the sky.  on the west side of the freeway, beneath the moon, i saw stars in the dark sky.  my attention was caught by a dark mass in the sky that seemed to be backlite.  i looked bact to the object several times until i finally noticed the there seemed to be lights under the bottom half of the object.  the lights were very bright, and the object was moving very slowly.  i slowed down trying to maintain eye contact. i finally pulled my truck to the shoulder and got out of my tractor.  the object was still moving slow enough to be mistaken for a balloon and that was what i thought i would see.  the object was rotating. the lights on the bottom were now facing me and were clearly in an oval pattern around the outer edge of the object.  i tried to take pictures with my camera but it wouldnt focas.  it was maybe 1.5 miles to my west.  maybe 50 to 60 yards in length.  and floated across the sky while appearing to corkscrew through the air.  it seemed to stop.  and then right itself.  the lights on the bottom of the object brighted, and suddenly the object "rocketed" forward.  it moved away very quickly, but i still saw the light for a good 60 to 75 seconds.  there was no sound.  when i finally lost sight of it in the night i jumped back into my truck and headed to my destination. i was excited by what i saw and sent text messages to a friend and a nephew.  by the time i got to benton harbor michigan i was on my c.B. trying to see if anyone may have seen anything.  one driver told me that he saw fighter plans in the night sky but i wasnt sure if he was telling me the truth.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black silent oval shaped object spotted. watched from shoulder of freeway. watched object fly off.

content.detailedDescription: As my friends and i were walking out of a local mall,  something made me turn around and look up.  i then alerted my 4 friends to look up.  we were in awe.  right above us was,  what appeared to be a ufo.  it was silent and hovering over our heads.  we continued to watch while the object silently and slowly exited the area.  as we got into the car to leave we were all in shock.  we continued on the highway looking upward in the sky.  we noted all kinds of activity in the sky by this time it was dark.  we had all seen airplanes in the sky before but this seemed to be diferent. lights were moving with great speed from one point to another. to this day 30 years later the experience stays with me, i am convinced that what we saw that day was indeed a ufo. during a conversation with my fiancee's brother in law he had mentioned that around that year he was coming home from work one morning when he had seen a u.F.O. just over the tree tops, stop his vehicle and looked directly up,stood there for a few moments,and then watched the object move quietly away just over the tree tops. this took place over rt 44 in ashford,ct. and this object he said was huge, and silent.
content.summary: Hovering large disc shaped with 3 tiers,silent ,
